mapper.select:
select count(*) from orders o left join order_item items on o.oid = items.oid left join view_product_detail vpd on items.psid = vpd.psid where mid = #{mid} and
o.oid > '0'

select oid, psid, ostatus, odate, oicount, oitotalprice, pname, bname, pccolorcode, pcimg1, pcprice, psize from ( select rownum rn, o.oid, items.psid, o.ostatus, o.odate, oicount, oitotalprice, pname, bname, pccolorcode, pcimg1, pcprice, psize from orders o left outer join order_item items on o.oid = items.oid left outer join view_product_detail vpd on items.psid = vpd.psid where mid = #{mid} and
rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) where rn > ( #{cri.pageNum} - 1 ) * #{cri.amount} order by odate desc
mapper.insert: insert into orders(OID, OZIPCODE, OADDRESS1, ORECEIVER, OPHONE, OTEL, OMEMO, OEAMIL, OUSEDMILEAGE, OBEFOREPRICE, OAFTERPRICE, MID, PMCODE, CPID, OADDRESS2) values (order_sequence.nextval, #{ozipcode},#{oaddress1},#{oreceiver},#{ophone},#{otel},#{omemo},#{oemail},#{ousedmileage},#{obeforeprice},#{oafterprice},#{mid},#{pmcode},#{cpid},#{oaddress2})
mapper.update: update orders set ostatus = '주문 취소' and odate = sysdate where oid = #{oid}
mapper.select: select oid, psid, ostatus, odate, oicount, oitotalprice, pname, bname, pccolorcode, pcimg1, pcprice, psize, obeforeprice, oafterprice, ousedmileage from ( select rownum rn, o.oid, items.psid, o.ostatus, o.odate, oicount, oitotalprice, pname, bname, pccolorcode, pcimg1, pcprice, psize, obeforeprice, oafterprice, ousedmileage from orders o left outer join order_item items on o.oid = items.oid left outer join view_product_detail vpd on items.psid = vpd.psid where mid = #{mid} and o.oid = #{oid} )
